content: rounds 8 of the cc and 7 of the mc and then 8 rounds of the colourblock in the mc a tip to work jogless 1 round stripes after knitting the first round with a new colour lift the stitch below the first stitch of the next round onto the left needle knit it together with the first stitch of the next round and then change colours and continue with the next round keep an eye on your gauge at the colour changes when finishing you may notice gauge issues along the seamline on the rs of your work use your 4mm needle to pull the sts and adjust the gauge do this before blocking and again after blocking as required i used this technique to work jogless stripes https //www youtube com/watch v=9vbgaukxuco&t=583s technique for fixing gauge in stripes https //www instagram com/reel/dpdlwupj3t0/ igsh=mw5qmzj6zmgxzm9nea== construction the reliable raglan is worked seamlessly from the top down and in the round you ll begin at the collar before working the yoke which includes optional german short row to shape the neckline and raglan increases to form the shoulders once the yoke is complete the stitches are divided at the armholes and the body is joined to work in the round the sleeves are then picked up and worked down to the cuffs allowing you to easily adjust the length as desired friday knits 2025 reliable raglan pattern 7 pattern begin here collar round 1 -
